statements: SELECT * FROM proteomics_data WHERE protein_id = 2;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteomics_data WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, expression_level FROM proteomics_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteomics_data WHERE protein_name LIKE '%actin%';
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteomics_data WHERE expression_level < 0.3 ORDER BY expression_level ASC;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, expression_level FROM proteomics_data WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY protein_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, expression_level FROM proteomics_data WHERE protein_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM proteomics_data WHERE protein_name LIKE 'H%' AND expression_level < 5 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT protein_id, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM proteomics_data GROUP BY protein_id HAVING AVG(expression_level) > 15 ORDER BY avg_expression DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT protein_name, COUNT(protein_id) AS total FROM proteomics_data GROUP BY protein_name HAVING COUNT(protein_id) > 2 ORDER BY total DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name FROM proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteins WHERE gene_name = 'ABC';
SELECT * FROM datasets ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, source, number_of_samples FROM datasets WHERE number_of_samples >= 10 ORDER BY dataset_name ASC;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, molecular_weight FROM proteins WHERE expression_level > 50 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, source, date_uploaded FROM datasets WHERE number_of_samples > 100 ORDER BY date_uploaded ASC;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, molecular_weight, expression_level FROM proteins WHERE gene_name LIKE 'ABC%' AND molecular_weight < 5000;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, gene_name, expression_level FROM proteins WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY expression_level DESC, protein_id ASC;
SELECT dataset_id, dataset_name, source, date_uploaded FROM datasets WHERE date_uploaded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteins ORDER BY protein_name ASC, expression_level DESC;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteins WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_date FROM samples WHERE sample_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT analysis_results.result_id, analysis_results.result_value, proteins.protein_name FROM analysis_results INNER JOIN proteins ON analysis_results.protein_id = proteins.protein_id WHERE analysis_results.result_value > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC, sample_name ASC;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteins ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_date FROM samples WHERE sample_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT protein_name, result_value FROM proteins JOIN analysis_results ON proteins.protein_id = analysis_results.protein_id ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM samples JOIN analysis_results ON samples.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id WHERE result_value > 0.5;

SELECT protein_name, expression_level, sample_name, sample_date, result_value FROM proteins JOIN analysis_results ON proteins.protein_id = analysis_results.protein_id JOIN samples ON samples.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id ORDER BY expression_level ASC, result_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteins WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteins ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT sample_name, expression_level FROM samples JOIN analysis_results ON samples.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteins WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT experiment_name, description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT sample_name, protein_name, expression_level FROM samples JOIN proteins ON samples.sample_id = proteins.id;
SELECT sample_id, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM analysis_results GROUP BY sample_id HAVING avg_expression > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name, molecular_weight FROM proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 10000;
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type, sample_date FROM samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University X';
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence, expression_level FROM proteins WHERE expression_level < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 5000 ORDER BY protein_id ASC;
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM proteins WHERE expression_level < 0.5 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution LIKE '%University%' ORDER BY researcher_name;
SELECT sample_name, tissue_type, sample_date FROM samples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_type, num_samples FROM experiments WHERE num_samples > 10 ORDER BY experiment_type ASC, num_samples DESC;
